topic.title: Moving a License Server installation to a new machine

body.p: Sometimes a License Server deployment needs to be moved to a different virtual machine, for example if your organization is moving to a different cloud provider.
To ensure you make this transition with minimal impact on Oxygen users in your organization, follow these steps:

ol.li: Open the web-based administration page of your existing License Server installation

Send a request to support@oxygenxml.com asking to deactivate your license. This email should include the following information:
The license key you obtained at step 2.
The reason for which you want to move the License Server to a new virtual machine.
You will receive an email that contains the license key to be activated on the new server.
Install the License Server on the new virtual machine
Configure the license key your received at step 4 on the new License Server installation.

Perform the required configuration to move all Oxygen users to the new server.
This is typically done by configuring the domain name of the License Server to point to the new virtual machine.
